desc: I am looking for a qualified/professional person who can do this drawing (see attached drawing) in a great way.  This is apartment in a building. I need it to be implemented with all details with 3d max . I have done draft on home by website but it is very basic.If you are not into details this is not the right project for you. Also you should have good suggestions for the interior design to maximize the spaces and show the beautyI have many other projects for the right person.The right person has to realize how the end product should look like for me. (It should be semi modern designs)This is how it has to look:1.	Doors – medium brown wood color (there are doors into the apartment and into the room)2.	Windows have to be visible - on both sides (there is a balcony on one side in the reception)3.	Tv on the wall in the living and in the bedroom 55 inch4.	Lower and higher cabinets in kitchen , the kitchen will be opened totally from 1 side with counter bar on the dining room . in the kitchen, there will be cloth washing machine , big refrigerator ,  plates washing, machine , oven , Microwave cabinet , stove , double washing sink Dimensions for the kitchen should be 2.75 *4.6 with curved right edge5.	There will be two bathrooms , 1 in the middle and one in the last master room .a.	1st bathroom : dimensions 4.59 * 1.58 . this will have jacuzzi under the window with 1.4 * 2 then the rest of the bath roomb.	2nd bathroom : shower cabin and the rest of the bathroom (creative ideas for the bath room to make the master room look bigger)6.	Living room : between the kitchen and the  1st bathroom  it will have one 3 person sofa and two 2 person sofa and 1 chair and TV in front7.	Master room : the last room in the apartment it should have king bed  , big wardrobe  or dressing room ,mirror with its desk , TV in front of the bed  . dimensions for the bedroom should be 4.13 *4.78 including the small bath room (2.5*1.42)8.	The colors should be natural and look like cozy9.	The reception and the dining area and long walking area will be porcelain in the floor10.	The rooms will be HDF material for floors11.	Simple and creative Gibson board should be on the ceiling with spot lights12.	All rooms should have windows13.	All walls colors should be from the attached picture.I have attached 2 PDF , screen shot for the layout of the apartment and color sheetI will choose a freelancer fast and I want the project done hopefully in 1 to 2  days.this will be the start if you showed good work.
title: 3ds MAX modelling apartment top view / micro budget
